retrieve_object: User wants the robot to fetch or bring an object to them.
locate_object: User wants the robot to find or locate an object.
scan_environment: User wants ther robot to look around or inspect the environment.
navigate: User wants the robot to go to a location.
multi_step_retrieve: User instruction contains multiple steps including retrieval.
multi_step_manipulation: User instruction contains multiple steps including moving or placing objects.
